urls.title: What is Self Check-In?
urls.description: 1. What is self check-in? This is a service that allows you to check-in for your AirAsia flights at your own convenience via the airasia Super App for a contactless and hygienic experience. 1. AirAsia encourages guests to self check-in via the airasia Super App to minimise physical contact and crowding at the airport. Since 1 April 2022, AirAsia’s counter check-in service is strictly available for exempted categories of guests only at all airports in Malaysia. Among the exempted categories are senior
